sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, Button, Grid, Paper } from '@mui/material';
import { Logout, People, Assessment, Settings } from '@mui/icons-material';

const InicioInventech = ({ usuario, onCerrarSesion }) => {
  return (
    <Box
      sx={{
        minHeight: '100vh',
        background: 'linear-gradient(to right, #e3f2fd, #90caf9)',
        display: 'flex',
        justifyContent: 'center',
        alignItems: 'center',
        padding: 4
      }}
    >
      <Paper elevation={8} sx={{ padding: 6, borderRadius: 4, maxWidth: 800, width: '100%' }}>
        <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#0d47a1' }}>
          ¡Bienvenido a INVENTECH, {usuario?.usuario || 'Administrador'}!
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mb: 4 }}>
          Este es tu panel principal. Elige una opción en el menú lateral para comenzar.
        </Typography>

        <Grid container spacing={2}>
          <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
            <Button fullWidth variant="contained" startIcon={<People />}>
              Gestión de Usuarios
            </Button>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
            <Button fullWidth variant="contained" startIcon={<Assessment />}>
              Ver Reportes
            </Button>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
            <Button fullWidth variant="contained" startIcon={<Settings />}>
              Configuración
            </Button>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
            <Button
              fullWidth
              variant="outlined"
              color="error"
              startIcon={<Logout />}
              onClick={onCerrarSesion}
            >
              Cerrar Sesión
            </Button>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Paper>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default InicioInventech;
